events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product does not match what I originally purchased.
System has categorised the issue as a Refund case based on keywords such as 'refund' and 'request'.
The customer request has been assigned to support agent Maria for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid return label and look forward to the refund.
We have processed your refund and emailed the return shipping label. Please send back the incorrect item at your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
The refund case is now closed. We are glad everything was resolved satisfactorily. Thank you for contacting customer support.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
